title: Outer Worlds Is Coming to Nintendo Switch - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.30.19
description:
Get a trial month of Hims for just $5 right now by going to http://forhims.com/kinda. 

Sign up for Zebit today at http://Zebit.com/kinda and get up to $2,500 credit to shop the marketplace!

Andrea and Greg talk about one of their most anticipated RPGs coming to Switch!

Time Stamps - 
00:05:05 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:05:55 - The Outer Worlds comes to Nintendo Switch
00:08:50 Best Friend Q. - Coming out of E3 this year The Outer Worlds is one of my most anticipated games. The Fallout 3/Elder Scrolls style RPG games are some of my favorites of all time, so everything in me wants to be through the roof with excitement about this. However, do you think this port will greatly diminish the experience of this game? - Gage (LukeShot1st in the chat)
00:15:40 - PS4 Numbers, Daniel Ahmad @ZhugeEX
00:16:40 Best Friend Q. - The PlayStation 4 hit 100 million units sold globally. This once again begs the question: "can it top the PS2's 155 million?" - KBABZ
00:20:40 - Switch Numbers, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:23:11 -  Fire Emblem Voice Actor Dropped for Abusive Behavior, Brendan Sinclair @ GIB
00:25:00 -  Deets on Fallout 76’s First Raid, Alysia Judge @ IGN
00:28:45 - Out today
00:37:50 - FaZe Clan Brings In First Female Member, 13-Year-Old Deaf ‘Fortnite’ Pro Ewok
00:40:20 - Wall Street Journal reported that real estate owners in malls are going to start renting space to create new esports arcades, lounges and stadiums. But, do you think this will attract people? - The Nano Biologist
00:47:30 - THIRDLOVE
00:49:14 - UPSTART
Reader mail   -
00:51:00 - What do y'all do to find the time in your busy schedules to game and when did you realize you were playing games less? - Cale Dolfincorn
00:57:34 - I worry that in the next-next gen everyone is going to want $10-$15 monthly to have access to their library of games when I really just want to purchase just the one. So I need you to talk me off the ledge and tell me everything is going to be OK or do you think we are headed to a future heavy laden with multiple subscription packages? - Ray Briggs II
01:01:48 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Greg and Whitta
